original_title: "True Stories" Scenes From The Farm (TV Episode 1988)
overview: The documentary focused on the daily lives of the African-Caribbean community who lived on the notorious Broadwater Farm Estate, in Tottenham, North London.  In 1985 riots erupted on the estate in response to the death of local resident, mother Cynthia Jarrett, after the police raided her home.
title: "True Stories" Scenes From The Farm (TV Episode 1988)
